title: Disconnecting in Loading screen
body: I have been having a disconnect problem after champion select, and when I'm waiting on the loading screen. I get a message saying that I disconnected and it might be the network. I know my internet is fine. It takes about 3x times clicking on reconnect in order for me to get back into the game. I have tried everything you guys recommended and I'm still having this problem. I tried the Hextech repair tool, changing my DNS to the 0s, I made sure it's not blocked by my firewall. At this point, I don't know what else to do. Can I get some help by anyone??

replies.body: I know this thread is 3 months old, but I am having the same problem.  Champ select is fine then during the loading screen I DC.  Once the game starts (I duo with a friend), it allows me to connect to the game and I do not have a problem at all during the game.  It is only during the loading screen.  I guess I will try to delete the game and reinstall, but I really don't want to do that.

Your main issue seems to be a connection problem reaching the game server.  Normally, the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should fix this.  If it hasn't, grab the logs provided by the HRT and hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can help figure this out with you!
